name: Lilly and Sasha: Guardian Angels
description: After Sasha was deemed unworthy of redemption, she passed through the Nexus of Souls. Lilly, who had promised Sasha that she would never give up, followed her through the portal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel速 Pentium速 III equivalent or higher processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: I really love the story, you shoud try it out!!!!
